title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 67-4.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 67-4.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Subpart requires all school districts and boards of cooperative educational services, including those already classified as a public water system under 10 NYCRR Subpart
5-1, to test potable water for lead contamination and to develop and implement a lead remediation plan, where applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
67-4.1

Adopted

New

York State Register May 9, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 19, eff. 5/9/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
